src/classes/model.js
subscribe
description: Subscribes handler method to observer for model

name: subscribeTo
description: Subscribes handler method to property observer for path

name: validate
description: Tests value for validation without setting value to Model

params.name: value
params.description: JSON value to validate for validity

name: toJSON
description: Provides JSON object representation of Model

name: toString
description: Provides JSON String representation of Model

name: freeze
description:
Applies Object.freeze to model and triggers complete notification
-- unlike Object.freeze, this prevents modification
-- to all children in Model hierarchy

name: model
description: stub for model getter, overridden by Model sub-class

name: objectID
description: Getter for Model's Unique Object ID

name: root
description: Getter for root element of Model hierarchy

name: jsonPath
description: Getter for path to JSON Object for Model

name: isDirty
description: Getter for Model validation status for hierarchy

name: rxvo
description: Getter for model's RxVO owner object

name: options
description:
Get options (if any) for this model's schema
todo: review for possible removal

name: isFrozen
description: Getter for Object.isFrozen status of this node and it's ancestors

name: validationPath
description: Provides formatted string for json-schema lookup

name: createRef
description: creates owner Model reference on Proxied data object

handleObjectKey

description: Creates Model Child to set up Proxy Object

name: subscribeTo

name: fromJSON
description: Creates new PropertiesModel from JSON data

makeDirty
description: flags `model` node as being out of sync with tree

name: makeClean
description: flags `model` node as being in sync with tree

description: Performs model data validation against json-schema

name: refAtKeyValidation
description: Performs model data validation at KEY against json-schema

content:
{
  "author": "Van Schroeder <van@webfreshener.com>",
  "name": "rxvo",
  "description": "RxJS + JSON-Schema Based Observable Data Models",
  "keywords": [
    "rxjs",
    "json-schema",
    "validation",
    "validatable",
    "observable",
    "proxy",
    "model",
    "json",
    "data",
    "object",
    "array",
    "hash",
    "map",
    "dictionary"
  ],
  "version": "1.0.0-beta.2",
  "main": "./index.js",
  "licenses": [
    {
      "type": "MIT",
      "url": "http://www.opensource.org/licenses/MIT"
    }
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/Webfreshener/RxVO.git"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "rxjs": "^5.5.6"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "ajv": "^6.4.0",
    "babel": "^6.5.2",
    "babel-core": "^6.18.2",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.3",
    "babel-plugin-transform-remove-strict-mode": "0.0.2",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-register": "^6.18.0",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "codacy-coverage": "^2.1.1",
    "deep-equal": "^1.0.1",
    "es6-weak-map": "^2.0.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-accessor-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-exclude-source-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jest": "^22.1.4",
    "jest-babel-istanbul": "^0.1.0",
    "jest-each": "^0.3.1",
    "jsd-utils": "git+https://github.com/webfreshener/jsd-utils.git",
    "jshint": "^2.9.4",
    "jsonpath": "^1.0.0",
    "lodash.merge": "^4.6.1",
    "mocha": "^5.0.0",
    "mocha-lcov-reporter": "^1.3.0",
    "object.assign": "^4.1.0",
    "weakmap": "0.0.6",
    "webpack": "^4.0.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^2.0.10",
    "webpack-rxjs-externals": "^1.1.0"
  },
  "homepage": "https://webfreshener.github.io/RxVO/",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jest",
    "cover": "jest --coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage --token 8c62ed7b6f6a4be397ab746173d9c639",
    "build-test": "webpack --mode development; npm test",
    "build": "webpack --mode production",
    "version": "npm run build",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
  },
  "jest": {
    "collectCoverage": true,
    "coveragePathIgnorePatterns": [
      "/node_modules/",
      "/dist/"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
